ThingDef.label: Talabheim shield
ThingDef.description: An Empire soldier's shield. Easy to make, but only provides minimal protection. Painted in the red and white colors of the Empire state of Talabheim.

ThingDef.label: Talabheim improved shield
ThingDef.description: A sturdy Empire shield. Made mostly of metal, and provides good protection. Painted in the red and white colors of the Empire state of Talabheim.

ThingDef.label: Talabheim fine shield
ThingDef.description: An elaborate Empire shield. Very well built. Typically carried by officers, not rank and file troops. Painted in the red and white colors of the Empire state of Talabheim.
